attributes.action: Condemn the Iranian regime's violent repression of protesters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the British government increases pressure on the Iranian regime to respect the democratic aspirations of the people, stop violent repression of dissent, and outlaw and disarm the militia groups involved in this.

rejection.details: The PM has already called for an end to bruatlity witnessed following the Iraniian elections: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19703
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
